author: kpedro88
body:
The generic `HcalUpgradeDataFrame` class has now been fully supplanted by `QIE10DataFrame` and `QIE11DataFrame`, and is no longer needed. Related classes and algorithms are also no longer needed.

A few minor related changes:
* Fix some HGCal tests to use `QIE11DataFrame`
* Make `HcalTDC`'s primary function a template, pending potential renovations for modern use
* Remove never-used QIE10 reco algo in `HcalSimpleReconstructor`

attn: @igv4321, @bsunanda, @lgray, @mdhildreth
title: remove HcalUpgradeDataFrame and related classes/algos
